name: English Muffin Breakfast Strata
author: amycheryl
summary: We had this breakfast casserole at a bed and breakfast in Branson, MO (Anchor Inn on the Lake) and absolutely loved it.  I don't like breakfast casseroles that are too dry or too eggy and this one is perfect!
ingredients: ¼ cup butter, or as needed
10 ounces shredded sharp Cheddar cheese, divided
1 (8 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese, divided
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chilies, drained
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and stir in sausage
Cook and stir until sausage is crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink, about 10 minutes
Drain and discard any excess grease
Spread butter on the inside of each English muffin half
Arrange buttered English muffins in the prepared baking dish; top with half the sausage, half the Cheddar cheese, and half the mozzarella cheese
Whisk eggs, sour cream, and green chilies together in a large bowl; pour evenly over sausage and cheese layer
Top with remaining sausage, Cheddar cheese, and mozzarella cheese
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bake strata in the preheated oven until lightly browned and set in the middle, about 35 minutes
Let stand for 10 minutes before serving
